title: Markets, Economy, and Chart of the Day (Audio)

description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. (Carol Solo)\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Felipe Hernandez\u0010Bloomberg Journalist\u0010Bloomberg Intelligence\u0010Discussing the markets and economy with Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson, who also discusses his Chart of the Day "."Email Dave at DWilson@bloomberg.net to sign up for the Chart.
